responses: Hello! How can I assist you today?
Hi there, how can I help you?
Good day! What can I do for you?
Greetings! I'm here to help with your college inquiries.
Welcome to TCC Assistant! How may I be of service?

patterns: Where can I get the application form
responses: The Admission Office handles student applications. You can apply online or visit our office for more details.
For admission requirements and deadlines, please contact the Admission Office at the main building.
Enrollment information and forms are available at the Admission Office during business hours.
Visit our Admission Office for complete application procedures and requirements.
The Admission Office is located on the ground floor of the Main Building. Office hours: Monday-Friday, 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM.
Application forms can be downloaded from our website or obtained directly from the Admission Office.
The Registrar's Office manages student records and enrollment. Office hours: Mon–Fri, 8 AM–5 PM.
For transcripts, enrollment forms, or schedule changes, visit the Registrar's Office at the main building, 2nd floor.
Academic records and grade information can be obtained from the Registrar's Office.
The Registrar's Office handles all official student documents and academic records.
You can request official transcripts and certificates at the Registrar's Office. Processing time is usually 3-5 business days.
Course registration and schedule changes are processed through the Registrar's Office during enrollment periods.

patterns: How to reset student portal password
responses: The ICT Office handles tech support like student portal, WiFi, and email issues. They're located at the IT Building, Room 101.
For password resets, visit the ICT Office or contact our IT support team.
Technical assistance for student accounts and connectivity issues is available at the ICT Office.
The ICT Office provides comprehensive technical support for all students.
WiFi credentials and internet connectivity issues can be resolved at the ICT Office. Support hours: Mon-Fri, 7:30 AM - 6:00 PM.
Student portal access problems? Visit the ICT Office with your student ID for immediate assistance.
The Guidance Office offers counseling, scholarships, and career advice. Location: Main Building, Room 210.
To schedule an appointment for counseling or career guidance, visit the Guidance Office.
Scholarship information and personal counseling services are available through the Guidance Office.
Our Guidance Office provides comprehensive support for academic and personal development.
The Guidance Office offers free counseling services for students. Walk-ins welcome during office hours: Mon-Fri, 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM.
Career counseling and job placement assistance are available at the Guidance Office. Schedule an appointment online or visit in person.
The Office of Student Affairs manages student activities, clubs, and discipline. They're at the Student Center, Room 305.
For joining clubs or student activities, visit OSA or check our student portal.
Student organization information and campus events are coordinated by the Office of Student Affairs.
OSA oversees all student life activities and provides support for student organizations.
The OSA coordinates all extracurricular activities and student organizations. Visit them for club registration and event planning.
Student disciplinary matters and policy questions are handled by the Office of Student Affairs. Office hours: Mon-Fri, 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM.
